# Mars Vista API
> Unified API for NASA Mars rover photos with advanced filtering, location queries, and scientific metadata

## About
Mars Vista API provides programmatic access to 680,000+ Mars rover photos from Curiosity, Perseverance, Opportunity, and Spirit. Unlike NASA's basic API, we store 100% of NASA's metadata enabling advanced queries by location, Mars time, camera angle, and more.

## Documentation
- Human docs: https://marsvista.dev/docs
- AI reference: https://marsvista.dev/docs/llm/reference.md
- TypeScript types: https://marsvista.dev/docs/llm/types.ts
- OpenAPI spec: https://marsvista.dev/docs/llm/openapi.json

## Quick Start
All requests require an API key in the X-API-Key header.
Get your free API key at: https://marsvista.dev

```bash
curl -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_KEY" \
  "https://api.marsvista.dev/api/v2/photos?rovers=curiosity&per_page=5&include=rover,camera"
```

## Core Endpoints (v2 API - Recommended)

### Photos
- GET /api/v2/photos - Query photos with filtering
- GET /api/v2/photos/{id} - Get specific photo
- GET /api/v2/photos/stats - Photo statistics (group_by=camera|rover|sol)
- POST /api/v2/photos/batch - Batch retrieve by IDs (max 100)

### Rovers
- GET /api/v2/rovers - List all rovers
- GET /api/v2/rovers/{slug} - Get rover details (curiosity, perseverance, opportunity, spirit)
- GET /api/v2/rovers/{slug}/manifest - Photo history by sol
- GET /api/v2/rovers/{slug}/cameras - Rover's cameras
- GET /api/v2/rovers/{slug}/journey - Location tracking over time

### Cameras
- GET /api/v2/cameras - List all cameras

### Advanced Features
- GET /api/v2/panoramas - Auto-detected panorama sequences
- GET /api/v2/locations - Unique rover locations
- GET /api/v2/time-machine - Same location at different times

## Key Parameters

### Filtering
- rovers: curiosity,perseverance,opportunity,spirit (comma-separated)
- cameras: NAVCAM,FHAZ,MAST,etc (comma-separated)
- sol_min, sol_max: Mars day range
- date_min, date_max: Earth date range (YYYY-MM-DD)

### Advanced Filtering
- site, drive: Location coordinates
- location_radius: Proximity search radius
- min_width, min_height: Image dimensions
- sample_type: Full, Thumbnail, Subframe
- mars_time_min, mars_time_max: Mars local time (M06:00:00 format)
- mars_time_golden_hour: true (sunrise/sunset photos)
- mast_elevation_min, mast_elevation_max: Camera vertical angle
- mast_azimuth_min, mast_azimuth_max: Camera horizontal angle

### Response Control
- include: rover,camera (RECOMMENDED - includes related resources)
- fields: id,sol,earth_date,etc (specific fields only)
- field_set: minimal|standard|extended|scientific|complete
- image_sizes: small,medium,large,full
- sort: -earth_date,camera (prefix with - for descending)
- page: Page number (default: 1)
- per_page: Results per page (default: 25, max: 100)

## Authentication
Header: X-API-Key: <your-api-key>
Get key: https://marsvista.dev (free, requires email signup)

## Rate Limits (Free for all users)
- 10,000 requests/hour
- 100,000 requests/day
- Headers: X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Reset

## Response Format
JSON:API-inspired envelope with data, meta, pagination, and links.

## Legacy API (v1)
Drop-in replacement for the archived NASA Mars Rover Photos API.
- GET /api/v1/rovers/{name}/photos?sol=1000
- GET /api/v1/rovers
- GET /api/v1/manifests/{name}
